name: UpdateTaskProperties
description:
Update a task's properties in Ticktick.

Use this tool to update various properties of a task in Ticktick. It requires the task ID and project ID, while other fields are optional. Ideal for modifying task details such as status, title, or due date.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the task to update in Ticktick. This is required to identify the specific task to be updated.

value_schema.description: Task identifier - the unique ID of the task to update

parameters.name: task_update_properties
parameters.description: JSON object containing all the properties for updating a task. Includes required fields 'id' and 'projectId', and optional fields such as 'title', 'content', 'dueDate', 'priority', etc. Customize the task's details and attributes.

id.description: Task id - must match the task being updated (required)

projectId.description: Project id - must match the project containing the task (required)

startDate.description: Start date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

dueDate.description: Due date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified

reminders.description: Lists of reminders specific to the task

priority.description: The priority of task (None: 0, Low: 1, Medium: 3, High: 5)

startDate.description: Start date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

timeZone.description: The time zone in which the Start time is specified

status.description: The completion status of subtask - Normal: 0, Completed: 1

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ticktick API.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Task identifier - the unique ID of the task to update

value_schema.description: Task identifier - the unique ID of the task to update

id.description: Task id - must match the task being updated (required)

projectId.description: Project id - must match the project containing the task (required)

dueDate.description: Due date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified

startDate.description: Start date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
